Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The people have spoken and they demand action from the Federal Government to address poverty and gender equality. Recommendations from the Economic Inclusion Advisory Committee must be acted upon to raise payment rates and cover the cost of essentials. The current budget's investments for gender equality are appreciated but ongoing support in future budgets is necessary. Urgent action is needed to ensure that no one is left behind and that the budget aligns with priorities.
